entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0208.10728] The filer has reported a schedule of investments and has provided subtotals for the EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis. The filer has also reported values for the InvestmentIndustrySectorExtensibleEnumeration concept. The values reported for the InvestmentIndustrySectorExtensibleEnumeration concept should be used as members on the EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis or should roll up in a domain-member hierarchy to the member used as a subtotal. The following extensible enumeration values have been reported but are not being used as members on the EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis or can be reconciled to this axis.
- Non-DurableConsumerGoodsSectorMember, - RealEstateSectorMember.
Please ensure that these values are used as members on the EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis or are descendants of one of the following members scm:OilAndGasUtilitiesSectorMember, scm:AdvertisingPrintingAndPublishingMediaSectorMember, scm:NonDurableConsumerGoodsSectorMember, scm:ChemicalsPlasticsAndRubberSectorMember, scm:BroadcastingAndSubscriptionMediaSectorMember, scm:TransportationAndLogisticsSectorMember, scm:HotelGamingAndLeisureSectorMember, us-gaap:RetailSectorMember, scm:CapitalEquipmentSectorMember, scm:BeverageFoodAndTobaccoSectorMember, scm:DiversifiedAndProductionMediaSectorMember, scm:ContainersPackagingAndGlassSectorMember, scm:EducationSectorMember, scm:SoftwareSectorMember, scm:MetalsAndMiningSectorMember, us-gaap:ConstructionSectorMember, scm:DurableConsumerGoodsSectorMember, us-gaap:HealthcareSectorMember, scm:OilAndGasEnergySectorMember, scm:BusinessServicesSectorMember, us-gaap:FinancialServicesSectorMember, scm:HighTechIndustriesSectorMember, scm:FinanceInsuranceAndRealEstateSectorMember, scm:ConsumerServicesSectorMember, scm:AerospaceAndDefenseSectorMember, scm:EnvironmentalIndustriesSectorMember, us-gaap:AutomotiveSectorMember, that are used to define subtotals on the EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis.
Rule Element Id:10728 Rule version: 27.0.0RC1 - scm-20231231x10k.htm 150
